website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable, rugged, stocking foot waders designed for maximum storage, include wading belt, suspenders, and 4-millimeter neoprene booties.
pros: Waders constructed of 4-ply nylon (upper) and 6-ply nylon (legs)
The 4-N-1 BAP pocket system holds everything you need on the river and includes a flip-out large chest pocket, vertical zippered pocket, and hook-and-loop pocket
cons: A few customers say the pockets aren’t fully waterproof

customer_reviews.title: Best wader for bang buck!
customer_reviews.text: I have this wader since Aug. I put a lot miles hiking to spots for banking fishing. I also wore them in sled and drift boat.. I love breathable, light, durability (went a lot of BlackBerry bush n dense forest) and no tear or leak!! I use Korker boots and plus I had worn Simms and they leak n torn. Save your money by get Compass360 wader!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For the money these are great. The velcro pocket isn't so great, pocket sags down and the flap doesn't go over flush unless u use 2 hands and pull em up. Very minor but when you are holding a rod it's not ideal. The pockets are not waterproof at all, just keep a note of that. Even so they are comfy and if rather buy these then expensive Simms or something else.
customer_reviews.author: Thang Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Nice waders, great price
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used these waders in the water yet, but the fit, quality, and tremendous amount of storage is exactly what I’d hoped for when I made the purchase. I can hardly wait for the opportunity to try them in the water as this is my first ever pair of waders. Judging by appearance and fit, I feel confident they will meet all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Arrowood

customer_reviews.title: great quality, the sizing is a bit confusing
customer_reviews.text: I am 5′ 9′′ and 180 lbs. How you can see on the picture the waders are a bit large for me but.... When I chcecked the right size for me it should be size Medium. But from previous reviews from others I decided to buy a one size larger. I ordered size Large. I used it just once and can sey I am happy that I ordered size Large because if you need a bit hike or to make bigger step and lift your legs higher the inseam is right on the edge. I think in Medium size it would be inpossible to make a higher step for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They'll get the job done
customer_reviews.text: First off I'm 6'1-190 lbs so I ordered the LARGE. I've been having trouble trying to find waders that aren't baggy. These are nice waders and feel like they'll hold up really well. I was a little disappointed they didn't come with a patch kit for the price. They fit me pretty well but are a little tight in the inseam. The draw string at the top for your chest also doesn't hold when tightend. Overall not a bad pair for the money but not the best
customer_reviews.author: Sean T.

customer_reviews.title: Good for all types of wading, even saltwater flats.
customer_reviews.text: Just enough pocket storage and rugged enough to thrash through South Florida mangrove access areas if you're reasonably careful. Stocking feet. Hint: I wear neoprene low cut scuba shoes over the waders' feet, about two sizes larger than my size 10 1/2 feet. I find the shoes go on and come off easier than would high top boots. Some people who have rated this product found some problems with them but that hasn't been my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Mesah

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! We bought these for our son and he loves them. He has been fishing in the river in Wisconsin with his waders. All the pockets are a plus! Most importantly the waders are keeping him dry!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi M. Kuhl

customer_reviews.title: Did their job. Happy fisherman.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my husband, the fly fisherman. He used these last weekend in poor weather, rain,wind, and whitecaps. They worked very well. Kept him dry and let him cast away. Fit well for his size 15 feet. Description was spot on. Win-win.
customer_reviews.author: Linda in Nevada

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant Isnt Waterproof lesson learned
customer_reviews.text: Value for the money kept me pretty dry definitely not waterproof they are water resistant learned that lesson after the fact stitches for the hand warmer pocket tore slightly on the first day I guess for the money the are lightweight pretty comfortable kept my feet dry and clothes only got slightly damp but if your looking for complete waterproof look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Happy Husband
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the hubby, he tested them right away. We live in NM in December, and he was warm, no leaking he didnt catch fish, but he had fun!! Highly recommend these waders!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Ulibarri

customer_reviews.title: Just got this today
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item today. I am 5'7" and 175lbs with short legs and 9.5 shoe size. I got the medium. This fits pretty good. The feet are snug, the pants legs are too long (used to this...) but not too bad. Comfortable fit and looks and feels quality. I am going to be doing some surf fishing in New Jersey next weekend so I will report back at that time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product looks great right out of the bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pair of waders men and women. Packages very well. Both came with wader bags. Men’s fit great. My wife hasn’t tried hers on yet. Haven’t fished them yet but soon. Both pair look pair look great.
customer_reviews.author: jdell3000

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Used them for the first time yesterday. So far they are fine. (The real test is to see how long they last). Pretty good design. I ordered the 2XL. I wear a size 13 shoe and there was plenty of room in the footies. My biggest issue is that the top of the waders do not come up far enough. (They were about 2 inches below my nipples). All the other wade brands I have owned come up higher so that you don't get splashed under your arm pit if you are wading deeper water. (I am 6'4). They really need to extend this area.
customer_reviews.author: Keith M

customer_reviews.title: Great Waders / Great Price
customer_reviews.text: These are nice waders in this price category. If you purchase go with the bigger size as they are a little snug around the calf’s.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great breathable waders
customer_reviews.text: Great waders.. I've only taken them out once but for now they stay at 5 stars. Lots of pockets and confortable.
customer_reviews.author: Pao Vue

customer_reviews.title: Zero complaints
customer_reviews.text: Slopped about in the water for 3 hours and my feet were bone dry after. Comfortable enough to wear to bed!
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. Very roomy, great range of motion, and a ton of pockets. Good quality stitching and fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Cree

customer_reviews.title: Leaked
customer_reviews.text: Had to return due to leaking after the first use. Wanted them to work, especially for the cost. Was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nathan M Weiser

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit
customer_reviews.text: They did not fit well at all ao I returned them. Bother then that I think they were of fair quality
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Fit and look great
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my man for Christmas and they fit really well look very sturdy well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Luanne

customer_reviews.title: Leak on first wearing!!
customer_reviews.text: One star because first time wearing them they have leak in the pocket area of your jeans. Disappointed. Fit great and look like they will be great but should not be leaking on my first night out with them. I will def be contacting customer service. Once this is taken care of and I wear them for a few months, I’ll redo my review. Initially, not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Juhasz

customer_reviews.title: Good fit but a little tight in the middle
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit and wears good. Little tight in the mid section but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Walker

customer_reviews.title: Good waders
customer_reviews.text: Kept me completely dry. Good quality. The BAP should use a zipper instead of Velcro. That would have gotten 5 stars. The Velcro isn’t great
customer_reviews.author: Bretster

customer_reviews.title: Nice waders
customer_reviews.text: These are the best fitting waders I've ever owned. Lots of pockets for waders at this price range. I will be fishing in them tonight.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Schede

customer_reviews.title: Seems like great quality so far
customer_reviews.text: Only tried on so far and they fit really well. Guess the true test will be guiding in Alaska for 4 months tho.
customer_reviews.author: Nate peck

customer_reviews.title: Leaked after using for months
customer_reviews.text: Started off great. I fish 3 to 4 times a week in some gnarly areas. Left sock started leaking about 3 months into it. After fixing the seams on that foot a week later the right foot started to leak. Boots are snug with minimal rub, but they just didnt handle regular abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D'Angeli

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: It came in two days, good price and excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: RGOregon

customer_reviews.title: Great waders
customer_reviews.text: Awesome waders!! Everything anyone would need in waders. The fit is great . The socks fit perfect, not bulky with extra material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and light weight. Will see about toughness and longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Larry  Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I used them at pyramid lake in the middle of a blizzard and was warm with only sweatpants under them
customer_reviews.author: Newcomb

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: The waders fit perfectly and are light weight. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: They do not leak.  Kept really dry.
customer_reviews.text: Wore to work on part of dock that was underwater.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great Waders
customer_reviews.text: I am completely satisfied with my purchase, they are very comfortable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz Fink

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and comfortable. Looking forward to trying in the water
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Great for standing in the surf.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the waders, fit good and comfortable .
customer_reviews.author: Michael Grammes

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Simms at a fraction on the price.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect. The quality far exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waders are useless if they don’t keep you dry
customer_reviews.text: Started leaking after the 3rd time using these. Right at the seam on the where the neoprene booty attachs to the leg. Seemed like a nice set of breathable waders at a decent price. Lots if handy pockets, and the material seemed durable.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Selfa

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. Have had the same pair for over 2 years now, I have used them almost every weekend of both summers for fishing, as well as most of the fall while duck hunting. I have slipped and fallen into rocks, ran into sharp tree branches, caught them on barbed wire fence, and never seen a single scratch or cut on them. They keep you warm in the winter, and as long as you're in the water you're pretty cool in the summer. They could easily sell these for 400$. Its worth spending the extra 50-100$ on a pair like these, compared to some of the cheaper brands.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: I'm 6'2", 260 and a xl was good for me. tons of storage also.
customer_reviews.text: I got the waders last week and used them to scout rivers for salmon. They are really nice, the amount of pocket/storage space is a huge plus. I'm gonna get a second set as a backup soon.
customer_reviews.author: Chad S.

customer_reviews.title: Great waders but seams leaked after a few months! Company will not honor warranty!
customer_reviews.text: I had these waders from February to October and the seams started leaking. Called the company for a warranty replacement and they would not honor there warranty. Other than the leak of the seams. These are great waders for the price. But due to the amount of problems I had trying to get them replaced I will not buy compass 360 again
customer_reviews.author: joey currier

product_meta.title: Compass 360 Tailwater Stockingfoot Breathable Chest Wader
product_meta.description: The Tailwater breathable stockingfoot wader is a durable top performance wader. Produced with tough and durable 4-ply premium bi-component membrane and fabric upper body, and 6-ply bi-component full wrap lower legs. The legs have an articulated construction for ease of movement and fit. Constructed with premium branded seam seal tape and DWR coating and a single crotch seam to alleviate any chance of inseam chaffing. The Tailwater boasts a 4-in-1 B.A.P. (Big Ass Pocket) and is built to last.
feature_bullets: DESIGN – Made with premium, highly water resistant, breathable, 4 and 6 layer fabric. Seam tape and Durable Water Resistance coating. Durable 6-ply wrapping on lower ¾ of leg. Single crotch seam with no leg inseam.

FEATURES/BENEFITS – Made with contour fit, double taped, 4mm 100% neoprene booties that provide warmth, protection, and comfort for your feet. 4-layer, abrasion resistant gravel guards with lace hooks designed to keep rocks and debris out of your shoes.

EXTRAS – 4-in-1 B.A.P. with zippered pass through and box pockets. Flip out storage pocket. Equipped with belt loops and durable wading belt with quick release buckle. Built with an adjustable chest drawcord and fully adjustable elastic suspenders.

WADER CARE – Let your wader dry completely between uses if at all possible. Wash wader with cold soapy water. NEVER put your wader in the dryer. It is best to store your waders in a cool, dry place by hanging them from the feet instead of the suspenders.

WARRANTY – Compass 360 products are covered for one year from the date of purchase against manufacturer’s defects. Compass 360 is not responsible for normal wear and tear, commercial use, accidents, abuse, modification, misuse, or improper care.
